tag_list: user-experience, data-visualization, business-intelligence, microsoft-dynamics, sql-server, windows-mobile, volume-licensing, boeing, 787, 777, 737, 747-8, service-design, social-networking, mobile, tablet, ipad
overview:
Vaibhav is a designer, creative thinker of brands + user experiences across various industries including aerospace, fashion, software and workspaces. Currently working as a UX consultant at Microsoft, he has been part of the development of other products such as Microsoft Dynamics, Windows Mobile 7 and Microsoft SQL Server 2008.

At Boeing, he was responsible for transforming the user experience within the service network as well as redesign and simplify the processes involved in the phases of flight which involved redesigning the flight deck of the future. He has never lost a proposal to date and has been part of Gulf Air, United Airlines, China Eastern, Lufthansa as well as the recent US Air force Tanker. Clients include Samsung, Citicorp, Ricoh, Victoria’s Secret, Air France, KLM, Boeing, Gulf Air, Microsoft and others.

degrees.subject: Product Design
